title: JSON schema for devpm package.json files

vscodeDependency.description: Packages installed by visutal studio code. Key for vscode extension id, value for version. Version definitions: ''(empty) - install when not exists; 'latest' - uninstall and install latest, '1.0.0'(specified) - install when version mismatched.

pythonDependency.description: Packages installed by pip. Key for pip name, value for version. Version definitions: ''(empty) - install when not exists; 'latest' - uninstall and install latest, '1.0.0'(specified) - install when version mismatched.

vscodeSettings.description: Write to visual studio code user settings <https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/settings#_settings-file-locations>. Key and value format same to the user settings. In addition, the value support `devpm expression`: `$bash.which:[bin]` - returns the bin path in system by `which [bin]`; `$pip.which:[bin]` - returns the bin path in pip by `pip show [bin]`

osDependency.description: Packages installed by custom bash script. Key for excutable name after installed, value is an object describes script in platforms. The platform is from python `sys.platform`, include 'darwin', 'win32' and 'linux'.

win32.description: The dependency in win32, specified with a bash script or file URL.

linux.description: The dependency in linux, specified with a bash script or file URL.

darwin.description: The dependency in darwin, specified with a bash script or file URL.

repo.description: The repo uri for pre-commit plugin. see https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

rev.description: The revision of the repo, see https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

hooks.description: The hooks provided by the repo, see https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

gitHook.description: Write to git hooks for root project and it's git submodules. Support commit-msg, pre-commit

type.description: The hook type, regexp for regular expression

pattern.description: The pattern(s) to match the commit-msg

tips.description: The tips to show when the commit-msg test failed, used array to show multi-line.

type.description: The pre-commit hook type, 'pre-commit' for the python pre-commit which would generate '.pre-commit-config.yaml'

repos.description: The repos config used to generate '.pre-commit-config.yaml'

scriptsInstallAfter.description: Run AFTER the package is installed.

scriptsRestart.description: Run by the 'devpm restart' command. Note: 'devpm restart' will run the stop and start scripts if no restart script is provided.

scriptsUninstallBefore.description: Run BEFORE the package is uninstalled.

scriptsVersionBefore.description: Run BEFORE bump the package version.

scripts.description: The 'scripts' member is an object hash of script commands that are run at various times in the lifecycle of your package. The key is the lifecycle event, and the value is the command to run at that point.

lint.description: Run code quality tools, e.g. cpplint, ESLint, TSLint, etc.

postversion.description: Run AFTER bump the package version.

preinstall.description: Run BEFORE the package is installed.

postuninstall.description: Run AFTER the package is uninstalled.

serve.description: Start dev server to serve application files
